text: The men's shot put event at the 1978 Commonwealth Games was held on 12 August at the Commonwealth Stadium in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style=" text-align:center;font-size=95%" |- !Rank !!
